text: Dersu Uzala () is a 1975 Soviet-Japanese drama movie directed by Akira KurosawaКакие российские и советские фильмы номинировали на "Оскар"ДЕРСУ УЗАЛА (1975) and stars Yury Solomin, Maxim Munzuk, and Vladimir Kremena. It won an Academy Award in 1976. ==Actors== *Yury Solomin as Vladimir Arsenyev *Maxim Munzuk as Dersu Uzala *Vladimir Kremena as Turtygin *Alexander Pyatkov as Olenev *Svetlana Danilchenko as Anna *Suimenkul Chokmorov as Chzhan Bao == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Russian drama movies Category:Japanese drama movies Category:1975 adventure movies Category:1975 drama movies Category:1970s epic movies Category:1970s biographical movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Akira Kurosawa Category:Movies about hunters Category:Movies set in the 1900s Category:Movies set in the 1910s Category:Soviet drama movies
title: Dersu Uzala (1975 movie)
